title: Bug 2694: Editor Selection Dialog: UI suggestions (1GI6RPE)
description:
Bug 2694: Editor Selection Dialog: UI suggestions (1GI6RPE)

Press 'Add' for the associated editors.

a. Enable multiple selection.

c. Mark the default entry in the associated editors list as '(default)' (similar to perspectives).

NOTES:
KLM (10/10/2001 1:54:57 PM)
Also:

f. The dialog needs a width hint.

 g. The File Editors Preferences page grows in height when selected, but no other pages do the same.

I currently have fixes for a, c, f. Need to release.

KLM (10/10/2001 5:58:58 PM)
Released fixes for a, c, f, g.

SR:
MA (09.08.2001 12:04:06)
1. Go to the Workbench File Editors preference page.
2. Without selecting anything from the 'Internal Editors' section, switch to the 'External Editors' section and select an entry.
3. Switch back to Internal Editors and press 'OK'. This should not add the selected external editor.
